name: Fiend's Door
summary: Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety.
description:
Like many fiends, you have the supernatural ability to teleport yourself to safety. Once per day, you can cast dimension door as a 5th-level divine innate spell.Traits

Tiefling: A creature with this trait has the tiefling versatile heritage. Tieflings are planar scions descended from fiends. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tieflings.
